In order to escape from this lab, River must first figure out how to communicate with one of the lab's advanced robots, which River successfully communicates with using a special device called a "Neural Interface." Based on the preferences and genres provided, I would recommend the movie "End of Watch".
This movie follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends.
When they meet criminal forces greater than themselves, what happens?

Overall, "End of Watch" is a must-see movie that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
